https://pypi.org/pypi/aws_console_url#filesWelcome to ``aws_console_url`` Documentation==============================================================================``aws_console_url`` allow you to generate AWS console URL for debugging. For quick start, you can check this `Jupyter Notebook <https://github.com/MacHu-GWU/aws_console_url-project/blob/main/usage-examples.ipynb>`_. Also, you can find the full list of public api in `Public API Full List <https://github.com/MacHu-GWU/aws_console_url-project/blob/main/Public-API.rst>`_.. _install:Install------------------------------------------------------------------------------``aws_console_url`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:.. code-block:: console $ pip install aws_console_urlTo upgrade to latest version:.. code-block:: console $ pip install --upgrade aws_console_url
